original_text:
They go up the hill to Luhith,
    weeping bitterly as they go;
on the road down to Horonaim
    anguished cries over the destruction are heard.
korean_text: 그들이 루힛 언덕으로 올라가면서 울고 호로나임 내리막 길에서 파멸의 고통스런 울부짖음을 듣는도다

sentences.original_text: They go up the hill to Luhith
on the road down to Horonaim
anguished cries over the destruction are heard
